name: Burg_320
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
diet heavy on salted fish, seaweed, preserved goods
crafts: boat repair, netmaking, simple carpentry
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
limited combustion industry; no high-pressure steam tech
long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned

remote waystation on a coastal trade route
